price: 99. (Ibraahiim) wuxuu yidhi: Anigu waxaan aadayaa xagga Rabbigay. Wuu i hanuunin.
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
